document_data.name: Brilla Silvershield
document_data.mainbody: '''Brilla Silvershield''' was a [[patriar]] of the noble [[Silvershield]] family who lived in their [[Silvershield estate|familial estate]] in the midâ€“14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Description: Brilla was a [[spellcaster]] of some manner. She quite susceptible to charm and gave in to others to some extended when being flattered.
document_data.Relationships: She was the husband to [[Grand Duke]] [[Entar Silvershield]], as well as mother to their two children, [[Skie Silvershield|Skie]] and [[Eddard Silvershield|Eddard]].
document_data.History: Throughout the {{YearlinkName|1368}}, Brilla lost her husband and both of her children at the hands of killers. Fortunately, her husband was resurrected by a noted healer.
